scripts.deb: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "relay   ,webpack ,node    ,tunnel  " -c "bgBlack.yellowBright,bgBlack.blueBright,bgBlack.white,bgBlack.redBright" "npm run dev-relay" "npm run dev-webpack" "npm run dev-server-debug" "npm run dev-tunnel"
scripts.dev: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "relay   ,webpack ,node    ,tunnel  " -c "bgBlack.yellowBright,bgBlack.blueBright,bgBlack.white,bgBlack.redBright" "npm run dev-relay" "npm run dev-webpack" "npm run dev-server" "npm run dev-tunnel"
scripts.dev-notunnel: ./node_modules/.bin/concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "relay   ,webpack ,node    " -c "bgBlack.yellowBright,bgBlack.blueBright,bgBlack.white" "npm run dev-relay" "npm run dev-webpack" "npm run dev-server"
